<!-- Sequential Birth Death Skyline model--> <BirthDeathSkylineModel spec="bdsky.evolution.speciation.BirthDeathSkylineModel" id="BirthDeathSkyContemporaryBDSParam.t:$(n)" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" conditionOnRoot="true" contemp="true"> <parameter name="birthRate" id="birthRateBDS.t:$(n)" value="2.0" lower="0." upper="Infinity" dimension="1"/> <parameter name="deathRate" id="deathRateBDS.t:$(n)" value="0.5" lower="0." upper="Infinity" dimension="1"/> <parameter name="samplingRate" id="samplingRateBDS.t:$(n)" value="0."/> <parameter name="rho" id="rhoBDS.t:$(n)" value="0.8" lower="0." upper="1."/> </BirthDeathSkylineModel>
<distribution id="rhoPriorContempBDS.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Prior" x="@rhoBDS.t:$(n)"> <distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Beta" offset="0."> <parameter name="alpha" value="80" estimate="false"/> <parameter name="beta" value="20" estimate="false"/> </distr> </distribution> <distribution id="deathRatePriorContempBDS.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Prior" x="@deathRateBDS.t:$(n)"> <distr spec='beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform' lower="0." upper="100"/> </distribution> <distribution id="birthRatePriorContempBDS.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Prior" x="@birthRateBDS.t:$(n)"> <distr spec='beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform' lower="0." upper="100"/> </distribution>
<!-- tree operators --> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_treeScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="3" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_treeRootScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="3" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" rootOnly='true'/> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_UniformOperator.t:$(n)' spec='Uniform' weight="30" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_SubtreeSlide.t:$(n)' spec='SubtreeSlide' weight="15" gaussian="true" size="1.0" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_narrow.t:$(n)' spec='Exchange' isNarrow='true' weight="15" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_wide.t:$(n)' spec='Exchange' isNarrow='false' weight="3" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_WilsonBalding.t:$(n)' spec='WilsonBalding' weight="3" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/>
<!-- BDSKY operators --> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_deathRateScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor=".75" weight="2" parameter="@deathRateBDS.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_rhoScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor=".75" weight="1" parameter="@rhoBDS.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='BDSKY_contemp_bds_birthRateScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor=".75" weight="10" parameter="@birthRateBDS.t:$(n)"/>
<operator id="BDSKY_contemp_bds_updownBD.t:$(n)" spec="UpDownOperator" scaleFactor=".75" weight="2"> <up idref="birthRateBDS.t:$(n)"/> <down idref="deathRateBDS.t:$(n)"/> </operator>
